name: Victor And The Mystery Of The Mysterious Meat Machine
name_original: Victor And The Mystery Of The Mysterious Meat Machine
description: Mostly made during a game jam Réalisé en partie durant une Game jam Welcome to your summer job! Bienvenue à votre job d'été ! In the course of his holidays, Victor has to work at the factory. During his first day, he witnesses really strange phenomenons. Curious, he starts to wonder about the mystery that hovers over this factory... Victor doit travailler à l'usine pendant les vacances. Durant son premier jour , il est confronté à d'étranges phénomènes. Piqué par la curiosité, il s’interroge alors sur le mystère qui plane sur cette usine... Credits : Baptiste Lonqueu 3D/2D artist Florent Rodrigo Game Designer/Narrative Designer Hugo Kieffer Programmer/Game Designer Louna Boutayeb 3D/2D artist Paul Rynkiewicz Programmer/Game Designer Luis Boutayeb Musician Nina Prinzhorn Voice over
